metadata.name: Zorro: Legendary Adventures
metadata.description: The legend of Zorro is well-known in all corners of the world.  Fans from every country have thrilled alongside the incredible adventures of the original masked hero.   American Mythology is proud to present Zorro Legendary Adventures which presents an authentic approach to the heroic exploits of Zorro.  These stories have never been seen in English and deliver unmatched action with beautiful illustration.
